name: Jigsaw Puzzles 5000+
description:
Another novelty of the Magic Puzzles series for fans of fun pastime. Solve the puzzle collection with images of various natural phenomenon: tsunamis, hurricanes, volcanic eruptions, storms, tornadoes. It's a great pleasure to feel the exciting power of a planet, but remember that after any bad weather always sun will shine.

Features:
- 4 levels of complexity: 7x6 (42 pieces), 9x8 (72 pieces), 13x11 (143 pieces), 18x16 (288 pieces) - available for any puzzle.
- Easy-to-operate control.
- Move parts in groups.
- Easy preview.
- Rotate pieces to fit the right place.
- Big choice of backgrounds!
